overview: Katsuni is the only star of French X who had an international career with many awards as much in Europe as in United States.  This acknowledgement deserved an exceptional compilation. Twenty scenes to discover how with girls, with one or two partners, the pretty Asiatic became one of the most extreme actresses of her generation. Deep throats, humiliation, sodomies, double penetrations, sperm showers: nothing scares Katsuni who seems always to want more
title: Katsuni Infinity
